you found out anything CrashProne: delete /var/lib/alsa/asound.state   ... what happens there, is that's your mixer defaults.  It saves your settings to that for when you restart.  Do a HARD (press the button, man!) reset.  It'll bring up a default mixer setup and you can work it from there.
